about_the_game:
In A Simple Ball Game, you will navigate your way across narrow pathways and moving obstacles, all designed to tick you off. I mean ... add some excitement to your life. With 70 unique stages, endless shortcuts to discover, and a robust set of physics, it’s anything but a simple ball game.

Good luck! :)

  • A game that proves even the simplest concept can pose an impossible challenge.

  • 70 difficult stages designed to push your 3D platforming skills to the limit. From narrow pathways to sprawling puzzle-box contraptions, no two stages feel the same.

  • Over 30 unlockable customizations for your ball. Some are gained by discovering hidden conditions, others by simply playing the game.

  • With practice, learn the ins and outs of the physics system, enough to maneuver the ball like a master. With so many shortcuts to discover, there’s plenty of room to flex your creativity.

  • Modern graphics and a smooth frame rate, finely tuned to make our spherical friend look exceptionally handsome.

  • You may start to feel ... a certain way about gravity.

A controller is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. And get ready for some precision flicking!
